titleStmt.title: James F. Robinson et al., Complimentary to the Union Ladies of Kentucky
CWG14558

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

body.p: COMPLIMENTARY TO THE Union Ladies of Kentucky.
The Governor, Heads of Departments, and General Assembly of Kentucky, will be pleased to see you at the CAPITAL HOTEL, FRANKFORT, KENTUCKY, Tuesday Evening, Feb. 24, at 8 o'clock.

MANAGERS.
His Excellency Jas. F. Robinson, Gov. of Ky.,
James H. Garrard, Treasurer,
John B. Bruner,
James Speed,
Isaac P. Miller,
J. F. Bell,
W. S. Rankin,
Jonas Martin,
E. Gabbert,
John S. Van Winkle,
Zeb. Ward,
J. R. Thomas,
J. C. Sayers,
J. L. Irvan,
W. C. Whitaker,
W. T. Samuels.
Thos. Turner,
Nat. Wolfe,
R. J. Browne,
James Calvert,
J. Barnes,
W. W Gardner,
C. F. Burnam.
M. P. Marshall.

COMMITTEE OF INVITATION.
R. A. Buckner, Speaker of the House of Rep's.
H. D. McHenry,
Sam. DeHaven,
John W. Finnell,
R. C. Anderson

COMMITTEE OF ARRANGEMENTS.
Alf. Allen,
H. I. Todd,
T. A. Duke,
J. Tevis,
T. W. Owings.

COMMITTEE OF RECEPTION.
D. C. Wickliffe, Sec. of State,
J. F. Robinson, Jr., Q. M. G.,
J. A. Prall,
J. K. Goodloe,
John B. Huston,
Bryan R. Young.
